content: In the world of fashion, what French term refers to a high-end custom-fitted clothing made by hand for an individual customer?

The French term you're referring to is "haute couture." It denotes the creation of exclusive custom-fitted clothing, often made by hand with extreme attention to detail and quality, designed specifically for an individual client. The term "haute couture" is legally protected in France and can only be used by members of the Chambre Syndicale de la Haute Couture, which oversees and enforces the standards and definitions of haute couture.
